610270.name: Bloody Trapland 2: Curiosity - Soundtrack
610270.description:
Soundtrack for Bloody Trapland 2: Curiosity

  • 1. Jungle world- "Jungle Javelin Juggle"
  • 2. Jungle bossfight - "A Crushing Battle"
  • 3. Desert world - "Sizzling Sun"
  • 4. Desert bossfight - "Slithering Menace"
  • 5. Ice world - "Chilly con Carnage"
  • 6. Ice bossfight - "A Frosty Fracas"
  • 7. Cave world - "Hollow Haven of Heinousness"
  • 8. Cave bossfight - "Hard Knock Rock"
  • 9. Candy boss - "Sticky Icky Suffering"
  • 10. Candy bossfight - "Sugar Sweet Smack"
  • 11. End world - "Fracture Factory"
  • 12. End bossfight - "Curiosity Killed The"
  • 13. Menu Song
  • 14. Credits song
610270.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
